11000.text_: The girl awakens on a cold stone floor\nand finds herself in a vast space\nwithin a massive series of structures.

11001.text_: Each memory dwells within a weapon.\nThe girl can regain what she has lost by restoring and collecting warped memories.

11002.text_: There are various locations within The Cage, and countless pathways that link such places together. \nIs there something to be found at the end of these paths, or do they inexorably lead to oblivion?

11003.text_: The ever-changing landscape in The Cage may be influenced\nby the stories contained within the weapons' memories.

11004.text_: Those of this species instinctually steal and consume human dreams in the hope\nthey might one day become human themselves.\nBut is that a means to an end, or an end unto itself?

11005.text_: What you see in a dream may be the memory of someone in a faraway land.

11006.text_: As you proceed, you will restore tales that have been warped and broken.\nIn this way, your journey of restoration may also become a story in a stranger's memory someday.

11007.text_:
A mysterious creature who calls herself Mama.
She seems to know something about The Cage, and acts as a guide for the girl.
There is a side of her that simply likes to do as she pleases,
so you'll sometimes find her just enjoying the scenery or poking around.

11008.text_: Similar to Mama in shape, but also quite different. Different personality, different thoughts—and just look at that adorable little bag and hat! A sociable fellow, he'll yammer on about just about anything—anything, that is, except what he is the carrier of.

11009.text_: Though she is kind and has a bright personality,\nshe wears a collar and bandages for reasons unknown,\nand is plagued each night by horrible dreams.

11010.text_: These beings have entered the weapons' memories and warped their stories.\nSome travel in flocks, while others prefer solitude—\nbut the reasons for any of their actions are ultimately a great mystery.

11011.text_: These massive denizens of The Cage are objects of worship in some places.

11012.text_: These strange statues hold weapons with memories and can be found across The Cage,\nthough their exact origins are unknown.

11013.text_: "Sometimes I felt like all they wanted to do was fight. It was...terrifying."\n—Fragment of an audio recording

11014.text_:
"If only I'd had the strength...
Whenever I look back, the pain
of what I lost runs through me."
—A Woman Imprisoned by the Past

11015.text_: "I was much too used to this feeling\nI had no name for."\n—Shattered Memory Data Fragment

11016.text_: "Kill more swiftly than death—\nbefore the final breath can be drawn."\n—From a Fragment of a Bloody Diary

11017.text_:
"I was born at the foot and raised
at the peak, and when I descend,
I'm just a silly old fool."
—A mountain people's saying

11018.text_: "To return it to where it is supposed to be—to how it is meant to be..."\n—The Black Fool's lament

11019.text_: "Whether my reason for living be tragedy; whether my reason for fighting be despair..."\n—D:\Users\063y-RV12.08\unknown

11020.text_: "I will embrace you. Tightly—so tightly.\nTo prove all of this is real."\n—D:\Users\F66x-RV12.02\unknown

11021.text_: "Revenge is all I have.\nWithout that, it's just...fear."\n—Musings of a lonely boy

11022.text_: "It's okay, you're not going to die.\n I mean, I'm still alive, right?"\n —Conversation within a platoon

11025.text_:
A strange being that wanders The Cage.
It resembles a knight in armor, but also
a speechless insect. Regardless, it
seems to have some kind of goal...

12000.text_: Defeat the dark foes warping the weapon memories to restore their stories.

12001.text_: Follow the direction of the arrows to progress through the story.\nIf there are no arrows on the screen, search for bubbles.

12002.text_: The button on the upper-right of the screen opens the battle menu during combat.\nThere, you can see what items your current enemies drop, as well as change battle settings.

12003.text_: Battles proceed in real time.Your characters will perform normal attacks automatically.

12004.text_: Use skills at the right time to turn a battle in your favor.

12005.text_: The story will progress as you clear the main quest.\nYou can access special stories and limited-time quests via the subquests menu.

12006.text_: Some functions unlock as you progress through the main quest.\nClear it to unlock everything!

12007.text_: Daily quests are a great way to earn materials for enhancing and evolving weapons.

12008.text_: Guerrilla quests are limited-time events that give you more EXP materials than usual!

12009.text_: Character quests let you read through a character's story,\nprovided they have reached a certain rank.\nYou can raise a character's rank by adding them to your loadout and clearing various other quests.

12010.text_: You can fight other players in the Arena.\nAim for the top to gain more rewards!

12011.text_: You can look back at the story so far in the Library,\nas well as view images and movies from each completed chapter.

12012.text_: Companions and weapons you've acquired are recorded in the Encyclopedia.\nYou can view their stories by tapping on the corresponding icon.

12013.text_: In this minigame, you dodge bullets while killing enemies.\nDestroy as many as you can and aim for the highest score you can manage!

12018.text_: When a door won't open, look around for a Dark Scarecrow.\nIf you can't find one, search for a lock or lever nearby.

12019.text_: If you find a black bird separated from the flock, tap on it and see what happens!

12021.text_: Turning on eco mode will reduce power consumption on your device by,\nfor example, dimming the screen while auto-repeat is on.

12022.text_: The Exchange is the place to swap items, weapons, characters, materials, and much more.\nCheck it out whenever you obtain an Exchange-only item.

12023.text_: You can gain all manner of rewards by fulfilling specific conditions during missions.

12024.text_: You can unlock weapon stories by enhancing your weapons.\nTo view them, press and hold the weapon icon and switch to "story" view.

12025.text_: Daily missions have conditions that change every day,\nwhile challenge missions require repeated efforts.\nAdditional special missions will also be added during events.

12026.text_: Black birds often hide along the paths of The Cage.\nTap them to shoo them away and earn items.

12027.text_: Special items that can be obtained by fulfilling certain requirements. Each goodie does something different, and their effects are activated just by owning them.

13000.text_: A character's abilities will change depending on the costume equipped.

13001.text_: Some quests grant costume bonuses when you build a loadout of characters in specific costumes.\nSuch benefits change depending on the quest.

13002.text_: When a character's level rises, their stats do as well.\nYou can also ascend characters by gathering materials.

13003.text_: Ascending a character increases their level cap.\nIf you ascend a character to the maximum level possible, their skills get stronger.

13004.text_: You can equip three weapons in total: one main weapon and two sub-weapons.

13005.text_: You can raise a weapon's level by using enhancement materials or other weapons.\nYou can ascend a weapon by using a weapon of the same name as an enhancement material.

13006.text_:
When a weapon reaches max level,
it becomes possible to evolve it.
Evolving a weapon raises its rarity
by one rank.

13007.text_: A weapon's level cap increases when you ascend it.\nIt will also gain new abilities, as well as a higher level cap on skills.

13008.text_: Use the materials you collect to evolve specific weapons.\nKeep evolving weapons to restore them to their true state.

13009.text_: Wield skills in battle to deal damage or recover HP.\nUsing them at the right time can turn the tide of battle in your favor.

13010.text_: There are many kinds of abilities.\nSome cause status effects, while others recover HP. Additionally, some are always active, while others only activate once \nyou fulfill certain conditions.

13011.text_:
When you raise the level of a skill,
its existing effects are enhanced.
If you're having trouble in battle,
try enhancing your skills.

13012.text_: Equip a memoir to heighten a character's parameters, or an entire set to gain even more bonuses.\nRare memoirs start out with more secondary abilities.

13013.text_:
Memoirs unlock secondary abilities after
reaching a certain level. If it already
has four secondary abilities, then one
will be enhanced at random.

13014.text_: These allies fight alongside you if you equip them on the loadout screen.\nYou can only use a companion's skills once per battle.

13015.text_: Your companions' skills and abilities increase whenever a companion levels up.

13016.text_: When you send support to a friend or receive support from them, you'll gain stamina.\nMake sure to find as many friends as you can!

13017.text_: You'll gain a reward the first time you log in each day.\nYou can see all the rewards you've obtained by tapping on the sign\nMama is holding in the Mama Menu.

13018.text_: Your stats improve when you level up.\nAlso, if you find yourself losing more than you'd like,\ntry enhancing your characters and weapons.

13019.text_: You can deal greater damage to enemies if you target their weaknesses.\nTake enemy elements into consideration to turn the tide of battle in your favor.

13020.text_: Water is strong against fire and weak against wind. Wind is strong against water and weak against fire. Fire is strong \nagainst wind and weak against water. Light is strong against dark when the player is light, and dark is strong against \nlight when the player is dark.

13021.text_: Change up characters and weapons in your loadout to give yourself an advantage however you can.

13022.text_: Auto-Loadout automatically create a loadout of characters and equipment according to an element\nor other point of emphasis that you choose in the settings.

13023.text_: If you're having trouble in a fight, check the elements in the quest info and take another look at your deck.

13024.text_: The Defense Deck fights against other players automatically.\nYou can configure it from the main Arena screen.

13025.text_: These coins are earned as rewards in the Arena.\nThe amount you can gain depends on your rank.

13026.text_: Summons for each chapter reset at midnight on the first of every month.\nYou can check limitations on the summons details screen.

13027.text_: More powerful memoirs drop in higher-level dungeons,\nso enhance your equipment and take on the upper levels!

14000.text_: Be sure to brush your teeth well after eating.

14001.text_: Don't forget to wash your hands and gargle when you come home!

14002.text_: Make sure to rest whenever you're tired!

14003.text_: You were gone for a while, and Mama was worried!\nJust remember that I am always here for you.

14004.text_: Make sure to keep an ear open for the beautiful music that plays during your journey.

14005.text_: Your luck today is...GREAT! Fantastic things are in store for you!

14006.text_: Your luck today is...JUST SORTA OKAY! Still,\nwhy not head out and collect some companions?

14007.text_: Your luck today is...MEH.\nTake another look at your deck for a change of pace.

14008.text_: Your luck today is...BAD!\nBut hang on—this is actually the rarest outcome, so keep your chin up, kid!

14010.text_: tseggus ew ,sllits tuo kcehc ot ekil

14012.text_: Be confident in the first thing you say to new people!

14013.text_: Today we recommend the apple pie.\nIt's an exquisite treat with a flaky crust and a gooey middle!

14014.text_: Today we recommend the apple tart.\nYou can't beat the combination of sweet and sour apple with flaky pastry!

14015.text_: Today we recommend the baked apple.\nEat it warm right out of the oven and bask in the irresistibly fragrant scent!

14016.text_: Today we recommend the apple cookies.\nTheir charm lies in the simplicity!

14017.text_: Today we recommend the apple cake.\nThe cream is not too sweet, and it subtly emphasizes the flavors of all the ingredients!

14019.text_: Why not stop and take a look at the sights in The Cage?\nYou may find something you wouldn't have noticed otherwise.

19000.text_: We are currently offering special login bonuses to celebrate our official release!\nLog in on three separate days to receive a total of 3,000 free gems!

19001.text_: The event quest "Record: Valley of Light" is now playable. Gather event-exclusive medals and exchange them for unique rewards.

19002.text_: The NieR Replicant ver. 1.22 crossover quest "Record: Pure Hills" is now playable. Gather event-exclusive medals and exchange them for unique rewards.

19003.text_: The event quest "Variation: Resentful Witch of the Blaze" is now playable. Gather event-exclusive summons tickets and earn unique rewards in the event summons.

19004.text_: The event quest "Record: City of Discontent" is now playable. Gather event-exclusive medals and exchange them for unique rewards.

19005.text_: The Drakengard 3 crossover quest "Record: Blood Oath's Edge" is now playable. Gather event-exclusive medals and exchange them for unique rewards.

19006.text_: The "Anecdote: Stars" panel missions are now available. Enjoy a unique visual and story by completing the missions.

19007.text_: The event quest "Variation: Tempestuous Senior Officer" is now playable. Gather event-exclusive summons tickets and earn unique rewards in the event summons.

19008.text_: The event quest "Record: Seat of Shadow" is currently playable. Gather event-exclusive medals and exchange them for unique rewards.

19009.text_: The event quest "Record: Coffin of Repose" is currently playable. Gather event-exclusive medals and exchange them for unique rewards.

19010.text_: The event quest "Variation: Armed Aberration of the Torrent" is currently playable. Gather event-exclusive summons tickets and earn unique rewards in the event summons.

19011.text_: The event quest "Abyss Tower: Flooded Dungeon" is currently playable. Complete the quest and earn special rewards.

19012.text_: The event quest "Record: Sunset Port" is currently playable. Gather event-exclusive medals and exchange them for unique rewards.

19017.text_: The event quest "Record: The Cage of Reincarnation" is currently playable. Gather event-exclusive medals and exchange them for unique rewards.

12014.text_: In this minigame, you help Mama avoid obstructions as she moves forward, collecting items with different effects all the while. Try to get the highest score you can!

19020.text_: The event quest "Record: Garden of Benediction" is currently playable. Gather event-exclusive medals and exchange them for unique rewards.
